Package com.company

Class Elements

java.lang.Object
com.company.Elements
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Card, Character, GameMenuButton, Shovel, Sun
public class Elements
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This is element class. the character class extends from this class The position field contain the coordinates of each element
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mahdi Rahmani & Nami Modarresi
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • Elements

      public Elements​(int[] position, java.lang.String elementPath, GameState gameState, int width, int height)
      This is the constructor of this class create a new Element with a given position
      Parameters:
      position - the x&y coordinates
      elementPath - the path of element gif or image
      gameState - the game state
      width - the width of object
      height - the height of object
